response.job_title: Mechatronic Engineer, National University of Colombia
response.summary:
Throughout my life as a student, and through everything I have learned over the years, I have realized that the most important thing is how you can use the knowledge and skills you have acquired over time to benefit humanity. 

I have become a very responsible, orderly and committed person to your work and tasks. In addition to developing a logical and rational way of analyzing things. I understood how important it is to share and work with different people, with different ways of thinking and analyzing to complete a goal.  

I have always been interested in innovation, development, but my greatest passion has been astronomy and space flight.
response.skills: Teamwork, Programing Languages and logic, Software, Analysys and Logic, Responsability

- Application of machine learning and deep learning tools to reconstruct 3D models of neurons (astrocytes).    
- Script programing to get the results of a method to analyze 3D nanoscale reconstruction of nuclei of brain cells.

school.name: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas

company.name: CSG
company.description: CSG is a leader in innovative customer engagement, revenue management and payments solutions that make ordinary customer experiences extraordinary. Our cloud-first architecture and customer-obsessed mindset help companies around the world launch new digital services, expand into new markets, and create dynamic experiences that capture new customers and build brand loyalty. For over 40 years, CSG’s technologies and people have helped some of the world’s most recognizable brands solve their toughest business challenges and evolve to meet the demands of today’s digital economy with future-ready solutions that drive exceptional customer experiences. With more than 5,000 employees in over 20 countries, CSG is the trusted technology provider for leading global brands in telecommunications, retail, financial services and healthcare. Our solutions deliver real world outcomes to more than 900 customers in over 120 countries.
